content.raw:
The vehicle is still slowly moving back and forth while it's supposed to be stopped. 

near_start.png shows the vehicle shortly after it starts drifting forward. 
shifted_forward.png shows the vehicle right before it stars to move backward. 
back_at_start.png shows the vehicle when it has drifted back close to the starting point.
rotated_car.png shows the vehicle rotated after a few iterations of drifting forward and back.

The cloud being displayed in rviz consists of the last 500 laser scan readings. All of these were taken after launching vrc_task_1.launch in atlas_utils. Our only modification was to change the starting position of atlas to be next to the car. We did not send any commands to any topic.

We're using the nightly build of drcsim / gazebo, so I think we should be running pull request #140 (supposed to fix this drifting problem).

The cloud being displayed in rviz consists of the last 500 laser scan readings. All of these were taken after launching vrc_task_1.launch in atlas_utils. Our only modification was to change the starting position of atlas to be next to the car. We did not send any commands to any topic.
